Specifically ; investigator aim determine single-pulse TMS primary motor cortex dominant hemisphere healthy , young adult significantly affect 1 ) heart rate heart rate variability , 2 ) blood pressure 3 ) baroreflex function . The first purpose study measure alteration sympathetic parasympathetic activation response TMS . To , measure HRV immediately single-pulse TMS . The second purpose investigate change blood pressure response TMS determine whether baroreflex , critical modulator blood pressure , inhibit TMS . Aim 1 : To determine single-pulse TMS primary motor cortex significantly alter heart rate variability . We hypothesize single-pulse TMS primary motor cortex elicit acute decrease heart rate result improve heart rate variability indicate significantly decrease LF power increase HF power . Aim 2 : To determine single-pulse TMS primary motor cortex significantly alter blood pressure baroreflex sensitivity ( BRS ) . We hypothesize single-pulse TMS primary motor cortex elicit acute decrease blood pressure inhibit baroreflex .
